comment.author: 66311327@N05
comment._content: "Umberto II, born Umberto Nicola Tommaso Giovanni Maria di Savoia, occasionally anglicized as Humbert II (15 September 1904 – 18 March 1983), was the last King of Italy, reigning for slightly over a month, from 9 May 1946 to 12 June 1946. He was nicknamed the May King (Italian: Re di Maggio)" en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Umberto_II_of_Italy

comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content: This photo was published in the New Outlook in September, 1915, credited to Bain New Service, with the caption: "THE CROWN PRINCE OF ITALY AS A BOY SCOUT Prince Humbert, the heir apparent to the throne of Italy, was born September 15 1904 and is therefore about to celebrate his eleventh birthday He is the only son born of the union in 1896 of Victor Emmanuel III King of Italy and Princess Elena daughter of Nicholas, King of Montenegro. books.google.com/books?id=KB7xg1-e9s0C&lpg=PA89&o... Another Bain Photo, apparently taken at the same time:

comment.author: 35014516@N03
comment._content: B-59 and artolog:  Thanks for pointing us to more information about the crown prince.  We'll include more complete identification next time we update the description.
